-   回归、主成分分析（Principal component analysis）、聚类：[R in action 3rd](https://livebook.manning.com/book/r-in-action-third-edition)、 [ISLR](https://www.statlearning.com/)

-   [Modern Statistics for Modern Biology](https://www.huber.embl.de/msmb/)
